title: Justine and the Midnight Catechism
description: Justine returns to familiar territory and a new work assignment. She will be in the midst of a difficult situation with asylum seekers that she could never have imagined before. This time she has with her a small companion who must prove her worth. Will a partner she left behind years ago provide the extra support Justine needs, or will she find herself at the point of exhaustion?
author: Ruth Hay
